thread.title: More exhibitors join 2nd instalment of Travel Revolution 2015
thread.title_full: More exhibitors join 2nd instalment of Travel Revolution 2015

author: Paige Lee Pei Qi, Singapore, June 13, 2015
title: More exhibitors join 2nd instalment of Travel Revolution 2015
text: More exhibitors join 2nd instalment of Travel Revolution 2015 Paige Lee Pei Qi, Singapore, June 13, 2015 THE upcoming Travel Revolution 2015 from July 24 to 26 will see 37 outbound travel agencies present at the fair, up from the previous 30 in its debut fair earlier this April. Kay Swee Pin, president of Singapore Outbound Travel Agents Association (SOTAA) said this three-day fair is targeting a total of 80,000 in visitors and S$100 million (US$74 million) in sales turnover. The earlier instalment of the fair welcomed 76,000 visitors with an overall sales figure of approximately S$100 million. Key outbound travel agencies like Chan Brothers Travel, CTC Travel, Dynasty Travel and SA Tours will be present. National tourism organisations from Japan, Taiwan and Korea will be promoting their destinations at the event as well. Held at Marina Bay Sands Expo Halls D to F, this exhibition spans 17,000m 2 , with more than 70 exhibitors participating. Admission to the event is free and the show runs from 10.00 to 21.00 over three days.
